get_true_metadata
=================

Description
-----------

get_true_metadata This function loads the true metadata from the
Metadata Sheet (.xlsx)

Usage
-----

.. code:: r

   get_true_metadata(file, load_example_data)

Arguments
---------

-  ``file``: input file
-  ``load_example_data``: TRUE if example data should be loaded
   (default: FALSE)

Examples
--------

.. code:: r

   get_true_metadata(input_file, FALSE)
